required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Acupuncture at ST36 and PC6 on Blood Pressure and Endothelial Dysfunction in Hypertensive Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Acupuncture at ST36 and PC6 on Blood Pressure and Endothelial

brief_summary.textblock: This is randomised, controlled study about effects of acupuncture on blood pressure and endothelial dysfunction in stage I hypertension patient without medication. Subject will receive 8 weeks of either acupuncture or sham acupuncture, measuring FMD and blood test before and after treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: To assess effects of acupuncture on endothelial function with FMD variation after 8 weeks treatments.

secondary_outcome.measure: To examine the effects of acupuncture on blood pressure, lipid , hsCRP level variation with ABPM after 8 weeks treatments.

arm_group.description: Procedure : ST 36 and PC 6 are selected, subject will undergo 20minute sessions twice a week for 8weeks. Disposable acupuncture needle(4cm sterilized stainless steel) will be inserted up to 1 cm depth

Procedure : Beside 1cm of ST 36 and PC 6 are selected( not meridian point), subject will undergo 20 minute. Disposable acupuncture needle(4cm sterilized stainless steel) will be inserted under 1 cm slightly.

intervention.description: acupuncture group : subject will undergo 20minute sessions twice a week for 8weeks. Disposable acupuncture needle(4cm sterilized stainless steel) will be inserted up to 1 cm depth sham acupuncture group : subject will undergo 20 minute. Disposable acupuncture needle(4cm sterilized stainless steel) will be inserted under 1 cm slightly.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients age 18-70 diagnosed stage I hypertension ( JNC-7) without taking hypertensive medication
Exclusion Criteria:
- Secondary hypertension
- DM
- History of cardiovascular disease
- Taking hypertensive medication
- Taking hyperlipidemic medication
- Smoking
- Pregnancy or feeding woman
- Cannot follow indication or there is no agreement of patient and conservator
- Investigator decide Inappropriate to trial

overall_official.affiliation: Oriental medicine center of Stroke and Neurology

facility.name: Oriental Medicine of Stroke and Nerologic center

responsible_party.name_title: Oriental Medicine of Stroke & Neurological Disorders Center
